import axios from"axios";const API_URL="https://us-central1-latte-ai-portfolio.cloudfunctions.net/askAI/api/ask";export async function askAI(type,value){let short=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;try{// Pass raw value to allow hardcoded backend to match keywords correctly
const wrappedValue=value;const response=await axios.post(API_URL,{type,value:wrappedValue,short});return response.data.responseText;}catch(error){console.error("Error calling AI API:",error);throw new Error("Failed to get response from barista ☕");}}
